pr_title: [ML] Unmute BWC tests and fix version after backport of #50553

timeline.message: [ML] Unmute BWC tests and fix version after backport of #50553

timeline.bodyText: Since #50589 is merged, shouldn't the version be V_7_6_0?
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: since BWC has passed with the version being wrong, I am guessing we don't have a BWC test that deletes analytics jobs do we?
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
Ah, 🤦‍♂
Indeed. I'll add one that creates and deletes a job in the mixed cluster.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.message: Correct version and add bwc test for deletes
